title: Team menu disappears from Hierarchy and Packages view
description: The issue initially occurred in step 9. Please note that TestClass.java is not part of any CVS repository, but I first noticed the problem with a file managed by CVS.
OB: In step 15, after closing the two new windows, when I select the TestClass in the package view and right-click to open the popup menu, the team menu is missing.
EB: I expect the team menu to be visible in the popup menu when I right-click on TestClass in the package view, just as it was in step 9.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Perform actions that lead to the issue (details are not provided).
